class="mod-headline-tip" href="javascript:void(0);" mon="m=53&a=5">\n<i class="tip-logo"></i>\n<div class="tip-content">点击刷新，将会有未读推荐</div>\n</a>\n</div>\n<script type="text/javascript">\n            // 如果有图的文章出现白图的情况（图片大小小于10*10则视为白图），去掉图片展示\n            function checkimg(obj){\n                // console.log(\'obj.width: \' + obj.width);\n                if(obj.naturalWidth < 10){\n                    var picWrapper = obj.parentElement.parentElement;\n                    var item = obj.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement;\n                    // console.log(\'-------picWrapper\');\n                    // console.dir(picWrapper);\n                    // console.log(\'-------item\');\n                    // console.dir(item);\n                    picWrapper.style.display = \'none\';\n                    if (item.className.search(\'notb\') > -1){\n                        item.className = \'feeds-item-detail notb\';\n                    } else {\n                        item.className = \'feeds-item-detail\';\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        </script>\n<div class="feeds" id="feeds"></div>\n<div class="feeds-more" id="feeds-more">\n<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="return false" mon="m=53&a=4"><span>更多个性推荐新闻</span></a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class="l-right-col" alog-group="focus-top-right">\n<div document.getElementById("_link_game");\n                    var cityname = "";\n                    var cityurl = "";\n                    var _loc = window.localAddress;\n                    if(!js_nav_bendi)\n                        return;\n                    if(HouseNavBendiTxt.city && _loc){\n                        var citylist = HouseNavBendiTxt.city;\n                        var (function(){\n                //本地设置定向省份\n                function setBendiName(){\n                    var js_nav_bendi = document.getElementById("_link_game");\n                    var cityname = "";\n                    var cityurl = "";\n                    var _loc = window.localAddress;\n                    if(!js_nav_bendi)\n                        return;\n                    if(HouseNavBendiTxt.city && _loc){\n                        var citylist = HouseNavBendiTxt.city;\n                        var localcity = _loc.city;\n                        for(var i=0;i<citylist.length;i++){\n                            if(citylist[i].name.indexOf(localcity) != -1){\n                                cityname = citylist[i].shortName;\n                                cityurl = citylist[i].url;\n                                break;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                    if(cityname == "" && cityurl == "" && HouseNavBendiTxt.province && _loc){\n                        var provincelist = HouseNavBendiTxt.province;\n                        var localprovince = _loc.province;\n                        for(var i=0;i<provincelist.length;i++){\n                            if(provincelist[i].name.indexOf(localprovince) != -1){\n                                cityname = provincelist[i].shortName;\n                                cityurl = provincelist[i].url;\n                                break;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                    if(js_nav_bendi && cityname != "" && cityurl != ""){\n                        js_nav_bendi.innerHTML = cityname;\n                        js_nav_bendi.href = cityurl;\n                    }\n                    if(js_nav_bendi && cityname == "" && cityurl == ""){\n                        js_nav_bendi.innerHTML = "本地";\n                        js_nav_bendi.href = "https://news.163.com";\n                    }\n                }\n                \n                if(window.HouseNavBendiTxt && window.NTESCommonNavigator){\n                    var utils = NTESCommonNavigator.utils;\n                    utils.jsonp("https://ipservice.ws.126.net/locate/api/getLocByIp", {}, function(res){\n                        if(res && res.result){\n                            window.localAddress = res.result;\n                            setBendiName();\n                        }\n                    });\n                }\n            })();\n        </script>\n    <!-- 底纹广告 -->\n<div (function(){\n                //本地设置定向省份\n                function setBendiName(){\n                    var js_nav_bendi = document.getElementById("_link_game");\n                    var cityname = "";\n                    var cityurl = "";\n                    var _loc = window.localAddress;\n                    if(!js_nav_bendi)\n                        return;\n (function(){\n                //本地设置定向省份\n                function setBendiName(){\n                    var js_nav_bendi = document.getElementById("_link_game");\n                    var cityname = "";\n                    var cityurl = "";\n                    var _loc = window.localAddress;\n                    if(!js_nav_bendi)\n                        return;\n document.getElementById("_link_game");\n                    var cityname = "";\n                    var cityurl = "";\n                    var _loc = window.localAddress;\n                    if(!js_nav_bendi)\n                        return;\n                    if(HouseNavBendiTxt.city && _loc){\n                        var citylist = HouseNavBendiTxt.city;\n                        var localcity = _loc.city;\n                        for(var i=0;i<citylist.length;i++){\n                            if(citylist[i].name.indexOf(localcity) != -1){\n                                cityname = citylist[i].shortName;\n                                cityurl = citylist[i].url;\n                                break;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                    if(cityname == "" && cityurl == "" && HouseNavBendiTxt.province && _loc){\n                        var provincelist = HouseNavBendiTxt.province;\n                        var localprovince = _loc.province;\n                        for(var i=0;i<provincelist.length;i++){\n                            if(provincelist[i].name.indexOf(localprovince) != -1){\n                                cityname = provincelist[i].shortName;\n                                cityurl = provincelist[i].url;\n                                break;\n                            }\n                        }\n                    }\n                    if(js_nav_bendi && cityname != "" && cityurl != ""){\n                        js_nav_bendi.innerHTML = cityname;\n       js_nav_bendi.href = "https://news.163.com";\n                    }\n                }\n                \n                if(window.HouseNavBendiTxt && window.NTESCommonNavigator){\n                            window.localAddress = res.result;\n                            setBendiName();\n                        }\n                    });\n                }\n            })();\n src="//top.finance.sina.com.cn/ws/GetTopDataList.php?top_type=day&top_cat=comment&top_time=20220824&top_show_num=10&top_order=DESC&js_var=comment_1_data&chars=gbk">\n\t\t\t//src的参数为排行系统生成的js链接(这里是每天，出国，取十条，顺序的取值，返回值是comment_1_data是的取值链接)\n\t\t\t//\n\t\t\t</script>\n\t\t\t<script language="JavaScript">\n\t\t\tvar MyNewsList;\n\t\t\tvar i;\n\t\t\tvar j=0;\n\t\t\tvar MyNews = new Object();\n\n\t\t\tfor (i in comment_1_data.data) //studyaboard_1_data.data这个参数为链接返回值那个对象的名称\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t  MyNewsList=comment_1_data.data[i];\n\n\t\t\tj=parseInt(i)+1;\n\t\t\tMyNews.i=MyNewsList[\'title\'];\n\t\t\tvar reg = /<font color=(.*?)>(.*?)<[\\/]font>/igm;\n\t\t\tvar title;\n\t\t\tvar ishot = \'\';\n\t\t\tif(j <=3){ishot = \' class="hot"\';}\n\t\t\tif(reg.test(MyNews.i))\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t   MyNews.i = MyNews.i.replace(reg,"\\$2");\n\t\t\t   document.write("<li"+ishot+"><span class=\'num\'>"+j+"</span> <a href="+MyNewsList[\'url\']+" class=linkRed target=_blank >"+ MyNews.i +"</a></li>");\n\t\t\t }\n\t\t\telse\n\t\t\t{\n\t\t\t   document.write("<li"+ishot+"><span class=\'num\'>"+j+"</span> <a href="+MyNewsList[\'url\']+" target=_blank >"+ MyNews.i +"</a></li>");\n\t\t\t }\n\t\t\t//可以在这里对列表样式对应设置一般都是<li>...</li>\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\t//\tdocument.write("");\n\t\t\t</script>\n\t\t\t<!-- 列表 end -->\n\t\t</ol>\n\t</div>\n</div>\n\t\t\t<div class="history udv-clearfix" 比例达14年来新高</a>\n                        \n                        \n                    </p>\n                \n          \n    \n</div>\n<script>\n    //获取dom列表\n    var dom = document.querySelectorAll(\'.titleStyle\');\n    for (var i = 0; i < dom.length; i++) {\n        var style = dom[i].attributes["data-style"].value;\n        var styleArr = style.split(\',\');\n        //遍历样式属性\n        for (var j = 0; j < styleArr.length; j++) {\n            var name = styleArr[j].split(\':\')[0];\n            var value = styleArr[j].split(\':\')[1];\n            if (name) {\n                name = name.replace(" ", "");\n            }\n            if (value) {\n                value = value.replace(" ", "");\n            }\n            dom[i].style[name] = value;\n        }\n    }\n</script>\n        \n            <div data-role="update-pa-0" class="list-mod list-mod-0">\n            \n                <div class="list16" data-spm="top-news2">\n                    \n
